meanings.definition: Of or relating to a sphere.
meanings.sent1: The spheric object rolled smoothly on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The basketball is a spheric object used in sports.
meanings.sent3: The spheric balloon floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her spheric earrings dangled elegantly as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The spheric planet glowed brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Having the shape of a sphere.
meanings.sent1: The crystal ball had a spheric shape that fascinated everyone.
meanings.sent2: The snowman's head was spheric and perfectly round.
meanings.sent3: The spheric cake looked almost too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: The spheric dewdrops glistened in the morning sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The spheric marbles rolled in all directions on the floor.

meanings.definition: In the shape of a sphere.
meanings.sent1: The spheric crystal reflected light in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The planetarium displayed a spheric representation of the solar system.
meanings.sent3: The spheric lampshade cast a warm glow in the room.
meanings.sent4: The spheric ornament hung beautifully on the Christmas tree.
